00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              ZERO CROSSING DETECTOR / COUNTER
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00006  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place

00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_ZEROX_H
00012 #define TT_ZEROX_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_zerox:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     analysis_samps;                         // analysis period in samples
00028                 double                                                  r_analysis_samps;                       // reciprocal of analysis size
00029                 bool                                                    last_samp_was_over_zero;        // was the last sample over zero?
00030                 long                                                    counter;                                        // counts zero-crossings
00031                 tt_sample_value                                 final_count;
00032                 long                                                    analysis_location;                      // keep track of how many samples so far
00033         
00034         public:
00035                 enum selectors{                                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00036                         k_analysis_size,
00037                 };
00038                 
00039 
00040                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00041                 tt_zerox()                                                                              // Constructor          
00042                 {
00043                         set_attr(k_analysis_size, 2000);
00044                         clear();
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 ~tt_zerox()                                                                     // Destructor
00048                 {
00049                         ;
00050                 }
00051 
00052 
00053                 // ATTRIBUTES
00054                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00055                 {
00056                         switch (sel){
00057                                 case k_analysis_size:
00058                                         analysis_samps = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00059                                         r_analysis_samps = 1.0 / val;
00060                                         break;
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00065                 {
00066                         switch (sel){
00067                                 case k_analysis_size:
00068                                         return tt_attribute_value(analysis_samps);
00069                                 default:
00070                                         return 0.0;
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073                 
00074                 
00075                 // DSP LOOP
00076                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00077                 {
00078                         bool this_samp_is_over_zero;
00079                         bool zerox_occured;
00080                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00081                         
00082                         while(temp_vs--){
00083                                 //val = *in++;
00084                                 this_samp_is_over_zero = (0 < (*in->vector++));
00085                                 zerox_occured = last_samp_was_over_zero != this_samp_is_over_zero;
00086                                 last_samp_was_over_zero = this_samp_is_over_zero;
00087 
00088                                 counter += zerox_occured;
00089                                 analysis_location++;
00090                                 
00091                                 if(analysis_location >= analysis_samps){
00092                                         final_count = ((sr * counter) * r_analysis_samps) * r_sr;
00093 //                                      final_count = ((sr * counter) * r_analysis_samps) / float(sr);
00094                                         analysis_location = 0;
00095                                         counter = 0;
00096                                 }
00097 
00098                                 *out1->vector++ = final_count;
00099                                 *out2->vector++ = zerox_occured;
00100                         }
00101                         in->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00102                 }
00103 
00104 
00105                 // clear
00106                 void clear()
00107                 {
00108                         last_samp_was_over_zero = 0;
00109                         counter = 0;
00110                         final_count = 0;
00111                         analysis_location = 0;
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 
00115 };
00116 
00117 
00118 #endif  // TT_ZEROX_H
